formElement.documentation: Previously defined configuration for the plugin
formElement.label: Configuration Name:

formElement.documentation: The name of the table you want to attach the file to.
formElement.label: Table name:

formElement.documentation: The sys_id of the record on the specified table that you want to attach the file to.
formElement.label: SysID:

formElement.documentation: Location and name of file to upload. Location is relative to the agent where this step will run., e.g. /tmp/WordDoc1.docx
formElement.label: location:
